Spatial distribution of multi‐simulation mean drought persistence error ( E
omrb ) for (a) monthly and (c) annual scales. Stippling indicates agreement in the sign of drought persistence error among more than 80% of the model simulations. Global distribution of drought persistence error for (b) monthly and (d) annual scales. CRU = Climatic Research Unit Timeseries version 3.1; UDEL = University of Delaware; GPCC = Global Precipitation Climatology Centre; ERA‐20C = ECMWF twentieth century reanalysis; 20CR = twentieth century reanalysis.
